item.title: Tesla stock pops after Trump comments on China tariffs and Powell, despite weak earnings
item.description: Tesla shares popped 7% after CEO Elon Musk suggested he will spend more time at the company and tariff optimism lifted broader investor sentiment.

item.title: 5 quotes: Elon Musk on robotaxi timeline, Optimus robots, tariffs, energy and Tesla's future
item.description: Elon Musk said the future of the electric vehicle maker is autonomous cars and vast numbers of autonomous humanoid robots.

item.title: Boeing to seek FAA approval this year to increase 737 Max production as losses narrow
item.description: Boeing's first quarter loss narrowed to $31 million in the first quarter and it burned less cash than analysts estimated.

item.title: Software giant SAPâ€™s shares surge 10% after first-quarter profit beat
item.description: SAP announced Wednesday that its first-quarter operating profit had risen by 58% year-on-year to hit 2.5 billion euros ($2.9 billion).

item.title: Tesla CEO Musk says time he spends on DOGE will drop 'significantly' next month
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said Tuesday on his company's earnings call that he'll spend much less time with DOGE starting in May.
